org.jboss.windup.reporting.config

Interface HintText

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Hint

    public interface HintText
    One of the builder interfaces of Hint operation.
    Author:
    Matej Briskar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HintLink with(Link link)
      Provide a link describing the topic more precisely
      HintEffort withEffort(int effort)
      Adds effort to the Hint.
      HintSeverity withSeverity(Severity severity)
      Specifies the Severity level.
      org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder withTags(Set<String> tags) 

    • Method Detail

      • with

        HintLink with(Link link)
        Provide a link describing the topic more precisely
        Parameters:
        link - the link to be added to the Hint
        Returns:
        the next step in building the Hint operation

      • withEffort

        HintEffort withEffort(int effort)
        Adds effort to the Hint. The effort represents the level of effort required to fix a task. Use this only if you do not want to specify the link, otherwise you will specify the effort later.
        Parameters:
        effort - number of effort to be added to hint
        Returns:
        the final stage of hint building

      • withSeverity

        HintSeverity withSeverity(Severity severity)
        Specifies the Severity level. This will default to Hint#DEFAULT_SEVERITY if not set here.

      • withTags

        org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder withTags(Set<String> tags)
